settings.title: Our Philosophy
settings.content:
Since 1992, DERMASWISS has developed skincare with purpose. Our mission? To simplify high-performance skincare for real people—at home.

We believe skincare should be:

- Effective from the first use 
- Safe for all skin types and all ages 
- Powered by science, nature, and innovation 
- Easy to use, easy to love

Each formula blends 

clinical-level ingredients like peptides, hyaluronic acid, ceramides, antioxidants, and botanical extracts. Our compact line is made to hydrate, renew, brighten, and protect without overwhelming your skin or your shelf.

settings.title: Why Skin Knowledge Matters
settings.content: We call it *Skin Knowledge*—because knowing what your skin needs (and when) changes everything.That’s why DERMASWISS products are multifunctional, minimal, and rooted in science, so you can create a smart routine that actually works.
